rationale: The autopilot shall change states from TRANSITION to STANDBY when the pilot is in control (standby).
fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (standby & state = ap_transition_state) then STATE = ap_standby_state

semantics.ft: (LAST V (( standby & state = ap_transition_state ) -> STATE = ap_standby_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( standby & state = ap_transition_state ) -> STATE = ap_standby_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( standby and state = ap_transition_state ) => STATE = ap_standby_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( standby & state = ap_transition_state ) => STATE = ap_standby_state).
semantics.description:
ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The autopilot shall change states from NOMINAL to STANDBYwhen the pilot is in control (standby).
fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (state=ap_nominal_state & standby) then STATE = ap_standby_state

semantics.ft: (LAST V (( state = ap_nominal_state & standby ) -> STATE = ap_standby_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( state = ap_nominal_state & standby ) -> STATE = ap_standby_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( state = ap_nominal_state and standby ) => STATE = ap_standby_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( state = ap_nominal_state & standby ) => STATE = ap_standby_state).
semantics.description:
ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The autopilot shall change states from TRANSITION to NOMINAL when the system is supported and sensor data is good.
fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (state = ap_transition_state & good & supported) then STATE = ap_nominal_state

semantics.post_condition: (( state = ap_transition_state & good & supported ) => STATE = ap_nominal_state)
semantics.ft: (LAST V (( state = ap_transition_state & good & supported ) -> STATE = ap_nominal_state))
semantics.pt: (H (( state = ap_transition_state & good & supported ) -> STATE = ap_nominal_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( state = ap_transition_state & good & supported ) -> STATE = ap_nominal_state))
semantics.ptExpanded: (H (( state = ap_transition_state & good & supported ) -> STATE = ap_nominal_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( state = ap_transition_state and good and supported ) => STATE = ap_nominal_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( state = ap_transition_state & good & supported ) => STATE = ap_nominal_state).

ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The autopilot shall change states from STANDBY to TRANSITION when the pilot is not in control (not standby)
fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (state = ap_standby_state & !standby) then STATE = ap_transition_state

semantics.ft: (LAST V (( state = ap_standby_state & ! standby ) -> STATE = ap_transition_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( state = ap_standby_state & ! standby ) -> STATE = ap_transition_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( state = ap_standby_state and not standby ) => STATE = ap_transition_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( state = ap_standby_state & ! standby ) => STATE = ap_transition_state).
semantics.description:
ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The sensor shall change states from NOMINAL to TRANSITION when the autopilot is not requesting support (not request)
fulltext: FSM shall always  satisfy if (senstate = sen_nominal_state & !request) then SENSTATE = sen_transition_state

semantics.ft: (LAST V (( senstate = sen_nominal_state & ! request ) -> SENSTATE = sen_transition_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( senstate = sen_nominal_state & ! request ) -> SENSTATE = sen_transition_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( senstate = sen_nominal_state and not request ) => SENSTATE = sen_transition_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( senstate = sen_nominal_state & ! request ) => SENSTATE = sen_transition_state).
semantics.description:
ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The autopilot shall change states from STANDBY to MANEUVER when a failure occurs (apfail)
fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (state = ap_standby_state & apfail ) then STATE = ap_maneuver_state

semantics.ft: (LAST V (( state = ap_standby_state & apfail ) -> STATE = ap_maneuver_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( state = ap_standby_state & apfail ) -> STATE = ap_maneuver_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( state = ap_standby_state and apfail ) => STATE = ap_maneuver_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( state = ap_standby_state & apfail ) => STATE = ap_maneuver_state).
semantics.description:
ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The sensor shall change states from FAULT to TRANSITION when the autopilot is not requesting support (not request) and limits are not exceeded (not limits)
fulltext: FSM shall  always  satisfy if (senstate = sen_fault_state & !request & !limits) then SENSTATE = sen_transition_state

semantics.post_condition: (( senstate = sen_fault_state & ! request & ! limits ) => SENSTATE = sen_transition_state)
semantics.ft: (LAST V (( senstate = sen_fault_state & ! request & ! limits ) -> SENSTATE = sen_transition_state))
semantics.pt: (H (( senstate = sen_fault_state & ! request & ! limits ) -> SENSTATE = sen_transition_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( senstate = sen_fault_state & ! request & ! limits ) -> SENSTATE = sen_transition_state))
semantics.ptExpanded: (H (( senstate = sen_fault_state & ! request & ! limits ) -> SENSTATE = sen_transition_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( senstate = sen_fault_state and not request and not limits ) => SENSTATE = sen_transition_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( senstate = sen_fault_state & ! request & ! limits ) => SENSTATE = sen_transition_state).

ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The sensor shall change states from NOMINAL to FAULT when limits are exceeded
fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (senstate = sen_nominal_state & limits) then SENSTATE = sen_fault_state

semantics.ft: (LAST V (( senstate = sen_nominal_state & limits ) -> SENSTATE = sen_fault_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( senstate = sen_nominal_state & limits ) -> SENSTATE = sen_fault_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( senstate = sen_nominal_state and limits ) => SENSTATE = sen_fault_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( senstate = sen_nominal_state & limits ) => SENSTATE = sen_fault_state).

ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The sensor shall change states from TRANSITION to NOMINAL when the autopilot is requesting support (request) and the autopilot reports the correct active mode (mode)
fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (senstate = sen_transition_state & request) then SENSTATE = sen_nominal_state

semantics.ft: (LAST V (( senstate = sen_transition_state & request ) -> SENSTATE = sen_nominal_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( senstate = sen_transition_state & request ) -> SENSTATE = sen_nominal_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( senstate = sen_transition_state and request ) => SENSTATE = sen_nominal_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( senstate = sen_transition_state & request ) => SENSTATE = sen_nominal_state).

ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The autopilot shall change states from PULLUP to TRANSITION when the system is supported and sensor data is good
fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (state = ap_maneuver_state & supported & good) then STATE = ap_transition_state

semantics.post_condition: (( state = ap_maneuver_state & supported & good ) => STATE = ap_transition_state)
semantics.ft: (LAST V (( state = ap_maneuver_state & supported & good ) -> STATE = ap_transition_state))
semantics.pt: (H (( state = ap_maneuver_state & supported & good ) -> STATE = ap_transition_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( state = ap_maneuver_state & supported & good ) -> STATE = ap_transition_state))
semantics.ptExpanded: (H (( state = ap_maneuver_state & supported & good ) -> STATE = ap_transition_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( state = ap_maneuver_state and supported and good ) => STATE = ap_transition_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( state = ap_maneuver_state & supported & good ) => STATE = ap_transition_state).

ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (! good & state = ap_nominal_state) then STATE = ap_maneuver_state

semantics.ft: (LAST V (( ! good & state = ap_nominal_state ) -> STATE = ap_maneuver_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( ! good & state = ap_nominal_state ) -> STATE = ap_maneuver_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( not good and state = ap_nominal_state ) => STATE = ap_maneuver_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( ! good & state = ap_nominal_state ) => STATE = ap_maneuver_state).

ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: Exceeding sensor limits shall latch an autopilot pullup when the pilot is not in control (not standby) and the system is supported without failures (not apfail).
fulltext: FSM  shall  always  satisfy if (limits & !standby & !apfail & supported) then pullup

semantics.ft: (LAST V (( limits & ! standby & ! apfail & supported ) -> pullup))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( limits & ! standby & ! apfail & supported ) -> pullup))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( limits and not standby and not apfail and supported ) => pullup)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( limits & ! standby & ! apfail & supported ) => pullup).

ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

rationale: The autopilot shall change states from MANEUVER to STANDBY when the pilot is in control (standby) and sensor data is good
fulltext: FSM shall always satisfy if (state = ap_maneuver_state & standby & good) then STATE = ap_standby_state

semantics.post_condition: (( state = ap_maneuver_state & standby & good ) => STATE = ap_standby_state)
semantics.ft: (LAST V (( state = ap_maneuver_state & standby & good ) -> STATE = ap_standby_state))
semantics.pt: (H (( state = ap_maneuver_state & standby & good ) -> STATE = ap_standby_state))
semantics.ftExpanded: (LAST V (( state = ap_maneuver_state & standby & good ) -> STATE = ap_standby_state))
semantics.ptExpanded: (H (( state = ap_maneuver_state & standby & good ) -> STATE = ap_standby_state))
semantics.CoCoSpecCode: (H((( state = ap_maneuver_state and standby and good ) => STATE = ap_standby_state)))
semantics.diagramVariables: Response = (( state = ap_maneuver_state & standby & good ) => STATE = ap_standby_state).
